titleStmt.title: The argument of a learned counsel, upon an action of the case brought by the East-India-Company, against Mr. Thomas Sands, an interloper
titleStmt.author: Pollexfen, Henry, Sir, 1632?-1691.

notesStmt.note: BM identifies "a learned counsel" as Sir H. Pollexfen. Cf. also DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
